DocAttribute.Name: RasterFormat
DocAttribute.Documentation: The format of the RasterCode often using a compression.

DocAttribute.Name: RasterCode
DocAttribute.Documentation: <EPM-HTML> Blob, given as a single binary, to capture the texture within one popular file (compression) format. </EPM-HTML>

DocWhereRule.Name: WR11
DocWhereRule.Documentation: <EPM-HTML> Currently the formats of bmp, jpg, gif and pgn, shall be supported. </EPM-HTML>
